scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start: npm run setup && cd backend && npm run dev && cd ../frontend && npm start
scripts.build: npm run setup && cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run setup && cd backend && npm run test && cd ../frontend && npm run test
scripts.eject: npm run setup && cd backend && npm run eject && cd ../frontend && npm run eject
